description: Referees in youth sports are frequently subject to nasty jeers and even violence. One of them is fighting back, using videos meant to publicly shame the offenders.
title: Referees’ Battle Against Abuse From the Sidelines
title_page: Referees’ Battle Against Abuse From the Sidelines - The New York Times
maintext: “Ref! You’re horrible. You should never do this again.” “We have kids that are trying to learn the skill of being a referee, and yet they’re in the middle of a cesspool of verbal insults by adults.”
